summary.span: 命名空間包含型別，可讓您實作 .NET Framework 應用程式中的快取。

span.span: The namespace contains types that let you implement caching in NET Framework applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命名空間中的類別提供如同在 ASP.NET 中使用快取設備的方式，但是不需要在 `System.Web` 組件上的相依性。The classes in this namespace provide a way to use caching facilities like those in ASP.NET, but without a dependency on the `System.Web` assembly. > [!NOTE] > 輸出快取功能與中的型別命名空間中導入了[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。The output caching functionality and types in the namespace were introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]. 此命名空間中所提供的快取類型提供下列功能：The caching types that are provided in this namespace offer the following features: - 所有的.NET Framework 應用程式 (不只是 ASP.NET) 來存取快取。Caching is accessible to all .NET Framework applications (not just ASP.NET). - 快取是可延伸。Caching is extensible. - 您可以建立自訂的快取提供者。You can create custom caching providers. 例如，而不是使用預設的記憶體中快取引擎，您可以建立自訂儲存在資料庫中的自訂物件，或檔案系統中的快取資料的提供者。For example, instead of using the default in-memory cache engine, you can create custom providers that store cache data in databases, in custom objects, or in the file system.
